sections.heading: This Act may be cited as the Collegiate Athletic Association Compliance Enforcement Procedures Act.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Collegiate Athletic Association Compliance Enforcement Procedures Act.

sections.heading: Definition.
sections.text:
In this Act, "collegiate athletic association",
"athletic association", or "association" means a collegiate athletic
association that, in fact, monopolizes all or any significant part of an
intercollegiate athletic sport on a national level.

sections.heading: Hearing required as prerequisite to finding of violation;
Nothing in this Act limits the right of any individual or
sections.text:
institution to claim the abridgement of any other due process right not
enumerated in this Act.

sections.heading: Exclusions.
sections.text: This Act does not apply to the following:

sections.heading: Cumulative remedies.
sections.text:
The remedies provided in this Act are
cumulative and in addition to any other remedies provided by law.

sections.heading: This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
